attributes.action: Reverse the 20% Police Cuts and Ban Further Cuts
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned, implore the Prime Minister to reverse the 20% cuts to our nations Police Forces. Cuts are criminal, and we really cannot afford to lose 16,000 frontline officers; the current amount of officers stationed in London. Along with this, further cuts should be banned, we must support our emergency services in their time of need.
